McMd::AnglePotentialImpl< Interaction > Class Template Reference
Angle Potentials

Detailed Description

template<class Interaction>
class McMd::AnglePotentialImpl< Interaction >

Implementation template for an AnglePotential.

Member Function Documentation

template<class Interaction >
void McMd::AnglePotentialImpl< Interaction >::readParam ( std::istream &  in) [virtual]

Read angle potential parameters.

This method reads the angle potential Interaction parameter block. Before calling Evalutor::readParam(), it passes simulation().nBondType() to Interaction::setNAtomType().

Parameters:
ininput parameter stream.

Reimplemented from Util::ParamComposite.
